Do you want to learn about combat?
Combat consists of performing 'combos'. Each weapon has its own unique set of combos.

Combos are constructed of 3 different move types. [YELLOW]Normal[] attacks, [YELLOW]Special[] attacks and [YELLOW]Defensive[] moves. Each of these is assigned a key (by default [YELLOW]Normal[] attack is [GREEN]Right-Ctrl[], [YELLOW]Special[] is [GREEN]Insert[] and [YELLOW]Defense[] is [GREEN]Right-Shift[]. These keys are rebindable in the options menu.

To start a combo hold one of the [YELLOW]Normal[], [YELLOW]Special[] or [YELLOW]Defense[] keys, then press a direction. You can then continue a combo by pressing one of those keys, or a directional one.

The available combos are displayed on each weapon in the form 'N-N-S'. N stands for [YELLOW]Normal[], S for [YELLOW]Special[] and D for [YELLOW]Defense[]. So in that example an available combo would be [YELLOW]Normal Normal Special[].
